com.mlt.task.file

Class FileScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mlt.task.Task
      • com.mlt.task.file.FileScanner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Callable<java.lang.Void>

    public class FileScanner
extends Task
    A FileScanner scans the source directories and optionally their sub-directories, notifying each file or directory found. It is implemented as a task to allow it to be executed in a separated thread with all the control options of a task.
    Author:
    Miquel Sas
